name: Alone With My Fear
description:
You wake up in a basement cell and you must rush to escape. Inspired by real events and occurrences, learn about human trafficking and what you can do to fight it. 

The project team will not accept donations but if you want to help go to Flordia Abolitions (https://floridaabolitionist.org/), Stop Human Trafficking (http://www.stophumantrafficking.org/), Paving the Way (https://www.stoptraffickingtoday.com/) , and other organizations. 

This game was made for the 2018 Mega Health Jam in Orlando, Florida.

Made and tested for Oculus Rift.
